text: King Abdulaziz International Airport () , also known by the acronym KAIA), is a Saudi international airport which is close to Jeddah." King Abdulazziz International Airport" at FlightStats.com ; retrieved 2013-3-7. ==History== Construction work on KAIA airport began in 1974, The airport officially opened in April 1981. ==Related pages== * List of airports in Saudi Arabia ==References== ==Other websites== * "King Abdulazziz International Airport" at Jed-airport.com Category:Jeddah Category:Airports in Saudi Arabia Category:1981 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Saudi Arabia
title: King Abdulaziz International Airport
